descriptionHTML:
This is the new official FC Porto application, now available to all fans.
Follow the news of the club, check the galleries for pictures and videos, access Estádio do Dragão with the app or smartwatch, check results and match reports of the football teams, and other sports, check the league table, schedule and squad, among many other features. Enable access to proximity alerts, for advantages and exclusive content.
Show you are a true Dragon and download the official FC Porto app now.
comments: Great app, but needs to add the possibility to buy game tickets through the app.
